verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
To Jesus' Heart,
all burning with fervent
love of men,
My heart with fondest
yearning shall raise
its joyful strain.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
While ages course along,
blest be with the loudest
song,
(the Sacred Heart of Jesus,
by every heart
and tongue) x2.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O heart, for me on fire
with love no man can speak,
my yet untold desire
God gives me for thy sake.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Too true, I have forsaken
thy love for witful sin;
Yet now let me be taken
back by they grace again.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
As thou are meek and lowly
and ever pure of heart,
so may my heart be wholly
of thine the counterpart.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
When life away is flying,
and earth's false
glare is done.
Still, Sacred Heart,
in dying I'll say
I am all thine own.
